description: MCP Quality Settings - Generic template for any team/product. Leave domains and critical_flows empty initially - the analyze tool can suggest them after scanning your codebase.

_examples.product: The name of your product/application (auto-detected from package.json if not set)
_examples.base_url: Base URL for your application (used by E2E tests)
domains: Example: billing, users, catalog, orders - detected by analyze tool
critical_flows: Example: login, checkout, reset_password - detected by analyze tool

targets.ci_p95_min: Maximum P95 CI time in minutes (default: 10)

_examples.note: This is a generic template. After running 'analyze', populate domains and critical_flows with suggestions.
